title: Google\Cloud\Trace\MessageEvent
name: MessageEvent
description:
This plain PHP class represents an MessageEvent resource. An event describing a message sent/received between Spans.

Extends Google\Cloud\Trace\TimeEvent

params.name: id
params.description: An identifier for the MessageEvent's message that can be used to match SENT and RECEIVED MessageEvents. It is recommended to be unique within a Span.

params.name: options.type
params.description: Type of MessageEvent. Indicates whether the message was sent or received. Defaults to TYPE_UNSPECIFIED.

params.name: options.uncompressedSizeBytes
params.description: The number of uncompressed bytes sent or received.

params.name: options.compressedSizeBytes
params.description: The number of compressed bytes sent or received. If missing assumed to be the same size as uncompressed.
